Reviews.Content: Come on - Entirely Overrated American Express mistakenly had this hotel rated as a 4 star property which was the only reason I booked it. I went to the Hotel website before booking which is entirely misleading. All the rooms seem to be facing a busy street leading to the Frankfurt Hbf. And sorry, but closing the windows does NOT block out the noise. The A/C did not work in my room and the staff really didn't care. I asked for a fan and the desk clerk almost laughed at me. This hotel is about 2 blocks from the red light district. Great location for that and the Main Train Station if those are your goals. I was in town for business and paid 140 Euro - OUCH! Couldn't wait to get out. The bathroom stunk and all and all, I definitely will not repeat.
Reviews.Author: texaholic

Reviews.Content: Close to station, phantastic value for money       Single room 255, hotel Atlantic Frankfurt
Reviews.Author: Gernereiserin

Reviews.Content: Avoid at all costs Leaving aside the fact I had 2000 euros stolen and another guest had 5000 euros stolen from our rooms by one of the staff I arrived back one night to be told to pay the bill there and then.When I explained I had left my money and cards at another hotel due to the thefts and would pay in the morning the police were called and I was thrown out of the hotel into the night while my luggage was kept until I paid.I am a seasoned traveller but have never come across anything quite like this hotel.Stay there if you must but dont say you werent warned.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
